title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB:
Build F2 (20020602) Redhat 7.2, GTK2 KDE 2.2 10 (GTK2 only)

To reproduce:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.

Expected behavior:
- Scrollbars should be disabled.

Observed behavior:
- Scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they have no effect.
- When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
EB: Scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they have no effect in the ImageAnalyzer example. They should be disabled to avoid confusion.
